sorry to ask, but Ive been having diabetes problems. what exactly did they admit you for in regards to your gd? were you going hg?

question: So I was admitted this morning bc of my diabetes. Baby Elijah looks good he's 4lbs 5 ozs @ 30 wks. He's measuring at 31 weeks. I guess we'll be here until the Dr says otherwise.
title: L & D Grrr!
